page.title: 05FELTWELL'S COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: Feltwell is between Thetford, Ely and Downham Market. It is not on any major route but two 'B' roads pass through. They are the Blll2 from Methwold to Barton Mills and the B1386 which runs from the A10 at Southery to Brandon. The Wilton Road (B1112 South) is the busiest with 170 vehicles per hour. The Methwold Hythe Road has the least traffic with 58 vehicles per hour. Feltwell has three buses each day to Hockwold, Brandon and Thetford, with one going through to Bury St Edmunds. Another bus goes through to Downham Market. Several private buses are used by firms to take their workers. Private buses also take children to Methwold High School. Quite a lot of people never use the public bus service. The nearest railway station is at Lakenheath, on the Ely-Norwich line.
